page.title: 01SURVEY OF HOUSES. 1.
page.content: {Detached Houses. My house is made of plywood and brick. It has wood round the windows and doors and sixteen windows. Of these there are four at the front, two at each side and eight at the back. The colour of the door and the garage is yellow. The rest of the paintwork is white. We have three chimneys and a television aerial. All the windows are double glazed and we have a patio door.The garage is attached to the house. Behind and above it we have built an extension which has made the kitchen bigger and added a shower room. My house is detached. It is made of bricks, wood and pebble dash. It is very new. There are six rooms upstairs and three downstairs.
